sentence.Network_en: This moment of mystic glory had an unquiet background.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个神秘性的光荣时刻却有了一个令人不安的背景.

sentence.Network_en: Till morning dawned I was tossed on a buoyant but unquiet sea.
sentence.Network_cn: 我在欢快而不安的海洋上颠簸,直到早晨.

sentence.Network_en: Their daughter Harmonia is the ancestress of the unquiet dynasty of The Dets.
sentence.Network_cn: 他俩生的女儿叫哈耳摩尼亚,日后成为战火连绵的底比斯王朝的开国女祖.
